deb_packages.query: select * from deb_packages where name like '%dev%' OR name like '%header%';
deb_packages.description: Retrieves all the installed DEB packages in the target Linux system.

portage_packages.query: select * from portage_packages where package like '%dev%' OR package like '%header%';
portage_packages.description: Retrieves all the installed packages on the target Linux system.

rpm_packages.query: select * from rpm_packages where name like '%dev%' OR name like '%header%';
rpm_packages.description: Retrieves all the installed RPM packages in the target Linux system.
